toki.title: Toki
toki.description: Toki is a korean street food restaurant located in Aalst. The website is a showcase of the restaurant's menu and has a bubble tea visualiser.

hairelby.title: Hairelby
hairelby.description: Hairelby is a hairstylist. The website is a showcase of the hairstylist's work and prices.

aux portes de soi.title: Aux portes de soi
aux portes de soi.description: This is my Aux portes de soi. It showcases my projects and skills.

barcelona offf festival.description: This is a 3D room that i made as a school project
